channel.title: Hi, I'm Shivani on First Site
channel.description: Recent content in Hi, I'm Shivani on First Site

item.description: Things I have done so far Setting up a github account and creating a page I created a github account and created a site there. I found this process quite simple. All we had to do was create a repository and then we could easily create a site through github pages. All we had to do was create one markdown file and we could add that to a page and we had a site!

item.title: Third
item.description: I attached an asciinema recording to my site. He is the recording

item.title: Second
item.description: I made a change to the site after deploying it!

item.title: About Me
item.description: I’m a first year CS major at Ashoka University. My interests include reading, listening to music and wishing I had a mac anytime something doesn’t work on my laptop.
